Fields no longer conceal the surrounding view, waters on lakes began receding, loud iron clangs from quarries started fading out. For the first time in a thousand years, they wondered if Lady Luck was still smiling upon them

What awaits them will indisputably be unforgiving. Be that as it may, nothing will cease them from delivering their sanctuary from extinction.

name: Kitty Q
description:
What the heck? Unsuspecting, you open the front door wide to find a box containing … a half-dead cat!? Using smart puzzle skills and clever outside-the-box thinking, you can help Kitty Q to escape her peculiar quantum superposition!

Don’t worry—Anna is there to help you. She’s the great-granddaughter of the world-famous physicist and Nobel Prize winner, Erwin Schrödinger. She will help you guide Kitty Q out of the crazy quantum world. Inside the box, everything follows its own curious rules. It really is an odd world here as Anna explains, but together you get to explore her great-grandfather Erwin Schrödinger’s specialist subject: quantum physics. Every puzzle in the game refers to observations, experiments, or phenomena from this totally unbelievable field of science. It’s a whole new world to discover!

description:
Survival of Primitive is a text-based adventure survival game with a great story line. You will play as a primitive man abandoned by his clan at birth. You have to arrange limited resources, build cozy cottage, craft weapons to survive against wild monsters and the force of nature. Going through a fate-changing journey in the game, feel the pain and pleasure as a primitive man.

description: A turbulent balloon ride across the ocean crash-lands you on a strange island. Stranger now because the accident wiped your memory clean and there are no answers to any questions. A map slightly jolts your mind with the thought that you are meant to be here, but where exactly are you and where is everybody else? Only by trekking through the landscape of this island can you figure out why you are here, and why you have placed yourself in such a dire circumstance. Search the island coasts and interior to recover your memory. Investigate an ancient temple, a sunken ship, and gloomy catacombs to find answers. Uncover helpful items, solve intriguing puzzles, and capture images within stunning locations. Each clue brings you closer to unveiling all of the truths, and perhaps your ultimate destiny.

name: Fairy Tower
description:
Retrieve the missing devices of Fairy Tower to save the world!

Since then the tower has been deep asleep in the fairy village. The legend tells that it is a remain of aliens who came to the earth from the outer space. Also the villager worship it as crops and plants grow big around the tower. But something unsual happened. The magical items were blown off with the power of the tower as the sealed door at the steeple suddenly opened. Therefore, the magical items were scattered all over the human world again. Retrieve the missing devices of Fairy Tower to save the world!

name: Haven & Hearth
description:
A sandbox game set in an Iron Age world loosely inspired by Slavic and Germanic myth and legend.

Players start the game surrounded by a vast and somewhat unforgiving wilderness, with only the most basic tools of survival at their disposal. The use of fire is a thematic focal point of the game's mythos, and an early and important task will be the simple lighting of one.

As the first hearth fires disperse the darkness of the surrounding wilderness, more pressing questions will present themselves to the players: Who are they? Where are they? And, most importantly, where are they going?

From this point on, players will have to blaze trails of their own into the unknown, the wilderness and the future, and explore and affect the world of Haven & Hearth using only their own best judgment and a chipped stone axe. Trust us, the stone axe is the shit.

As players progress, they will be able to acquire new skills and abilities, allowing them to perform a variety of tasks—such as the claiming of land, the construction of buildings and the cultivation of crops—each step forward making the basic task of survival somewhat easier. Having progressed far enough, players will, in time, be able to organize themselves into societies, from simple tribes and villages, progressing through republics, nation states and, ultimately, empires.

description: Music, dances, luxury cars and grandiose parties – it's the roaring twenties. Immerse yourself in the era by heading over to the burlesque party, take part in the jazz concert, go to the best casinos, walk the slopes of San Francisco and, of course, visit Hollywood. Travel to wonderful places and earn trophies while solving fascinating card puzzles in Roaring Twenties Solitaire!

Zombie Hord Mode
Once you are the last man standing, the game change and is not finish yet.. Zombies will run for your life and you will need to survive them the longest as you can.
A score will be calculated based on the number of zombies and players you success to kill !

description: Possibly bootleg in origin, or an unreleased prototype. Nearly identical to the Atari 400/800/XL/XE version.

name: Pac-Man
description: A canceled port from Atarisoft, which was planned for a 1983 release. Its cancellation was due to being arguably superior to the Atari 5200 version, with Atari believing that releasing the game would have effected sales of their own console(s). A prototype version has been dumped.

Board your Mobile Gun mech unit and explore, liberate regions and assemble an army to fight against the Mad Ruler of Gebronia before the world is brought to an end.

description: Omanac is a role playing action card game where you collect Omanac cards. These cards are your living weaponry given sentience by using life from your life point pool via a free ratio system. This makes your “entities”functionable battle partners and part of how you play the game. Choosing a combination based on battle type(s) and skills working to defeat other malicious entities as you level up with them.

name: Delisoba Deluxe
description:
A driving/racing game for Sega Saturn developed by CAVE and TBS Television.

It was made as a tie-in to TBS's mid-1990s Japanese game show Tokyo Friend Park, where one of the games, Delisoba ("delivery soba"), had celebrities command a virtual motorcycle trying to deliver soba to the TBS TV Studios. Deluxe is a "port" of this game to the Saturn, which adds features such as a time attack and track editor, and was not sold in stores, but rather given away at the show (either to winners or to audience members, exactly what is unknown).

name: Dengeki no Pilot: Tenkuu no Kizuna
description:
Our protagonist Hugo lives a peaceful life, far away from war in a remote country named Portland. One day, Hugo witnesses a plane crash and hurriedly checks for survivors. On board he finds only a single girl, Fiona, who is chased by armed forces.
Hugo, without fully comprehending what is going on, sees himself forced to use his late fathers robot Pirot in order to protect Fiona and flee with her.
Eventually their adventure leads them on board of the floating battleship Starlight.
Thats when the cogwheel of destiny starts to spin.

Inspired by the pothole filled roads of Lincolnshire in the UK, this game challenges even the best of drivers to make it as far along the road as possible without having a blowout.
Hit a small pot hole and your tyre pressure drops. Hit a big one and it's game over!

Dungeoned is a funny little dungeon crawler game with some action, puzzle and role playing elements. From level to level, through various dungeons and other places, you must find and activate the exit which leads to the next level.
Each dungeon needs a certain number of gold coins to reveal its exit. But beware: monsters, traps, logical puzzles and even an enemy with the same goal as yours will stand in your way.

Dead Pets Unleashed is a narrative, slice of life and management-lite game; get ready to unleash your inner demon.

description:
You are Paskal a tiny and bustling chameleon who aims to liberate his girlfriend from the hands of a colorless witch.
This witch sure knows how to run and hide!
She is pulling you through very challenging paths to keep you out of her way... Will she make it?

name: Slime Smasher EX

It's a casual and simple game for everyone! Just TAP and use the super magic to easily SMASH the uncontrolled Slime Army!
It was created within the concept of bubble wraps, whether for the addictive enjoyment or to purely relieve stress.If you love to pop bubble wraps, this is the game suitable for you!

description: You have to help Giuseppe Stradivarius to find the stolen violins! The violins were made by the great master of stringed instruments. You also need to find the unique stand made from selected Tyrolean wood of long exposure. You have to solve a lot of intricate puzzles and overcome tricky obstacles before you find out who the thief is. During the investigation, look for hidden objects by lists, silhouettes and play mini - games.

name: Pixel Pro Tennis
description:
Pixel Pro Tennis is a unique and addicting arcade tennis game, that combines realistic gesture controls with authentic physics and beautiful pixel-art.
Use the unique and simple touch controls to hit everything from a lob, to a slice, to a gloriously satisfying top-spin winner.

name: Luna Abyss
description: Luna Abyss is a narrative-driven, first-person action-adventure game. Discover a vast, derelict colony; deep within the belly of an ominous mimic moon. Fight twisted cosmic horrors in intense, fast-paced, bullet-hell combat.

name: Covert Front

name: Purple Fantasy
description: "Purple Fantasy" is a super free anime puzzle game! You can experience it by making the level you want~

name: Little Nemo the Clown
description: Little Nemo The Clown is a 2D Open World game inspired by good Metroidvania titles. Talk, Run, Fly, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Fantasy World full of Magic and Color. Little Nemo is a modern Maze Runner Adventure. Can you find the Clown before your Time runs out?

name: Autocrusher: Bumper Cars
description: Auto Crusher: Bumper Cars is a car destruction racing game inspired by the bumper car rides from amusement arcades and carnivals. In this game players will feel the excitement of crashing into other vehicles, coupled with the use of several power ups and upgrades , making this game a race for glory!

name: Nova Antarctica
description: Survive Earth's harshest conditions on a devastatingly beautiful journey shaped by the choices you make, the paths you take, and the stories you weave with the mysterious animals of Antarctica.

name: Sakura X Clash: Last Millennial Spring
description:
Sakura X Clash: Last Millenial Spring is an IKEMEN-based fighting game, that pays homage to arcade classics such as The King of Fighters and Street Fighter.
sXc also uses NGPC-styled graphics and aesthetic, aiming for a simple yet deep gameplay experience, making the game easy to pickup and play for begginers, but with a lot of depth for those who want to master it.
Featuring a (quite literally) colorful and constantly expanding cast of characters, each with its on gameplay style and unique quirks.

name: Solve This! Emoji Puzzle
description: Solve logic puzzles in this challenging brain teaser game, collect rewards and unlock different themes. Play through a lot of different levels with rising difficulty.

name: The Great Dick Invasion
description: After a series of apocalyptic climate events, Earth is now under attack by a legion of penis shaped aliens who seek to wipeout what remains of the human race. Defend what is left of mankind's most iconic landmarks in this fast-paced crazy Tower Defense game.

name: Magic Kingdom
description: Magic Kingdom - This is a 3D puzzle treasure adventure from a first-person perspective. You have to take on the role of an ordinary citizen in a small magical kingdom that lives in peace and prosperity and flourishes every year.

name: Projekt Everblood
description: Projekt Everblood is a 2D top-down action game set in an alternate World War 2. Embrace your vampiric abilities of flight, feeding and deadly fury to exact revenge on the enemy scientists that wronged you.

name: Zombie Escape: The Driving Dead
description:
Daniel, a young soldier, and his girl friend Annie, a pretty dancer, are peacefully living in city N. One day, after Annie went to city B for a play by invitation, everything changed…
Daniel woke up, finding himself in the Hospital morgue. He tried to recall something, but it is hard. Daniel couldn’t recall anything else, except that he was sent to the hospital as he collapsed when executing a mission.
People in the hospital all turned into zombies. Daniel had to escape …

name: Pathogen
description: Pathogen's simple-yet-addictive gameplay is augmented by a terrific presentation, with visuals that make it feel like you're playing on a computer from a 1980s sci-fi film.

name: The Golden Age
description: Sin descripción

name: Mad Defense

name: Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition - Deluxe
description:
Three Fourths Home is a visual short story in which you assume the role of Kelly during her drive through the storm. In the 20 miles between her grandparents' crumbling barn and her parents' home, she receives a phone call from her mother. While driving through a stylized representation of rural Nebraska, you must navigate an extended conversation between Kelly and her parents and younger brother.

Three Fourths Home takes a look into a specific moment of these characters' lives and their relationships with one another. The narrative touches on a variety of issues affecting Kelly and her family, including disability, adulthood, and familial obligation.

As a visual short story, dialogue choice is the primary focus of Three Fourths Home.
Between the main game and the epilogue, nearly 800 unique dialogue choices shade the story differently based on how you play. In addition to dialogue choice, you must also keep driving in order to keep the conversation going. Stop, and time slows to a crawl. Kelly has to move forward in order to get home.

Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition includes an expanded edit of the initial release as well as several new elements, including a new epilogue in addition to a number of extra features.

name: Sunday Lawd Reel 1
description:
Cranking SLOW at times is the key to playing this game...as it plays out as an old film, you can change the reels by slowing down cranks until a different outcome happens! It took lots of work to make, and I learned about the playdate image process....

FIXED crashing bug in reel1a..

name: Poker Soul
description: Poker Soul is a Texas Hold'em game with lovely ACG characters.

name: Cardterrupters
description: Turns not guaranteed in a roguelite deckbuilder where you can cancel the enemy's turns!

name: Verlet Ascend
description: Verlet Ascend is a physics based, action platformer with roguelike mechanics, a fully destructable procedurally generated environment, and rope swing physics. Fight creatures, loot enemies, upgrade your character, and climb your way up in an endless parkour.

name: Bloody Hell Hotel
description: In Bloody Hell Hotel, you embody a vampire. You wake up from a coma that has lasted for centuries, only to find your once-grand estate is now in ruins. It's time to turn it into a prosperous hotel! It's no easy task, though, as times are tough and resources are scarce. There are shortages of food, supplies, and workforce. Being a blood-thirsty monster doesn't help with customer satisfaction either. Luckily, underneath the estate lies a crypt and a system of caves. By foraging, farming, crafting, and fighting your way through the monster-infested dungeons, you'll find the resources you need to restore greatness to your mansion and turn it into a thriving hotel business.

name: Chug the Tiny Tugboat
description: Use reading skills to help Chug the Tugboat keep the bathtub shipshape!

name: Spooky Mansion Manager
description: Spooky Mansion Manager is a turn-based management game where you create Spooky Tours in a mansion you inherited from your grandpa. Ultimate goal is to acquire a hundred gold bars in as many weeks to pay back a loan. NOTE: This is not a scary game (ie. it doesn't have any jump scares etc.)

name: Forbidden myths
description: Role-playing game with action elements in the world of Slavic mythology. Go from a simple ordinary fighter to one of the most famous people in the principality, fighting hard and unusual monsters and solving the problems of fabulous creatures.

name: Photogenic Minds: Identity
description: "デッキ構築型３D探索サイコホラー"。 PM0:00からAM0:00までの12時間を支配し、無限ループを抜けて死者の魂を捕獲して下さい。 使えるのはたった1つのカメラだけ。

name: Lost Beyond
description: Lost Beyond is a Adventure Exploration game where your main quest becomes finding a way back to your dimension. Embark on a journey, find your way through a vast and mysterious environment and try to hold it together while the Universe tests your worthiness.

name: Tales of Tarium: Awakening from the Ashes
description: Explore this dark medieval world while fighting mythological creatures. Throughout betrayal, nervous battles and hidden truths decide whether to defend the honor of high members of the church, help a rebellious group of cultists or embrace on a quest to reveal the secrets of this land.

name: Grapple Glide
description: Grapple Glide revolves around momentum based swinging and gliding to complete courses set in a variety of themed worlds. Master the grappling hook and glider to reach the goal as fast as you can!

name: Milosc
description: miłość is a minimalist black & white framed game about friendship, love, self-exploration and existentialism. miłość is a unique blend of visual novels, JRPG’s and platforming beauty.

name: Idle Zombies Clicker
description: Idle clicker game with cute zombies!

name: Millennium Conflict
description: Millennium Conflict: a real-time strategy game set in space where you must act fast to stop attackers from conquering your universe. With 40 levels, weapon upgrades, and new generals to recruit, it's up to you as the only surviving male to lead your troops to victory.

name: Friendly Blonding
description: Friendly Blonding is a linear adult visual novel focused on the themes of netorare (or cheating) and moral degeneration (or corruption). It it a short story told from both the male protagonist's and his girlfriend's perspective.

name: Escape!!!
description: Escape is a single player horror game that challenges players to find their way through each maze, collecting items to escape, and avoiding creatures of the night. Any turn may be the wrong one.

name: Stuff Enuff
description: A competitive party game designed to ruin friendships!

name: Curvature
description: Take control of a highly adaptable battle machine and infiltrate a hostile civilization to keep peace in the universe. Build your own playstyle with a vast amount of gadgets, weapons and unique abilities. Survive and dominate a harsh and atmospheric world.

name: Caribbean Marque
description: Sail the open seas of the Caribbean in this light RPG game and experience the thrill of hunting down pirates or being a pirate! Along the way discover a cast of characters good and evil. Upgrade your crew and ship to become the most infamous pirate or maybe resist the temptation.

name: Summer: Life in the Countryside - Outing
description:
Additional elements:
・Outdoor map is added.
・Fast travel is added.
・Outing events "Camping", "Swimming", and "Summer Festival" are added.
・One ending is added.

name: Picot Ether
description: 『ピコエーテル』は新型ウイルスが蔓延した都市を救う薬剤調合シミュレーションゲームです。 プレイヤーは『Ｒ－ＢＯＷウイルス』が蔓延した都市の診療所医師となり、抗ウイルス薬の開発に勤しみます。

name: Public Land Hunter
description: Experience the challenge of hunting public land in this retro hunting sim. Hunt a variety of game using a range of weapons on procedurally generated parcels of land. Scout, set up and shoot.

name: Dreamcharger
description: Rogue-lite game about fights with random bosses and a full-fledged story campaign. Fight, craft, and become more powerful, to solve the main riddle.

name: Phantom Alchemy: Silvia's Dynamic Urban Planning
description: In order to make up for the corruption committed by her father, Silvia had to help the development of the border city as an alchemist. But if she wants to use alchemy, she must convert the spiritual power of residents into energy.

name: Karin's Digital Adventure
description: The hot fantasy game now - "SW (Sky World)" It is a virtual world just like the real world. There, Kali can play in her ideal form!

name: Godzilla: Omniverse
description: Play as, and fight against, 40+ monsters and mechas from the Godzilla omniverse.

name: Berlin Maniacs
description: In Berlin Maniacs you take on the role of the young and impressionable Tina in a fictionalized snapshot of West Berlin in the year of 1968, a time when state violence led to radicalization within the student protest movement.

name: Planet Achelous
description: Planet Achelous is a action adventure, free-roaming game.

name: Primasia: Chapter One
description: The Prime8 Gang arrive on Prime8 island in the first part of their journey. Trading with the other five islands to gain resources for crafting purposes they will learn about the island's history. They will meet new characters to learn other useful information about Primasia and the Land of Humans.

name: Flatcraft
description: An unreleased 1990s edition of the world's most famous block game. Explore this retro sandbox world with familiar mechanics such as crafting, building, and mining.

name: Charge Knight: A Duck's Tale
description: In this casual mechanics game, use continuous movement to overcome challenges. The unstoppable knight Dundee must be strategically driven on his journey, defeating enemies, solving puzzles and mechanics while using the scenery to his advantage.

name: Radio General: Water Rats
description: Take command of the First Canadian Army once again as you fight for the Channel ports and through the flooded polders of the Low Country. Construct bridges to cross canals and call in Air Support to perform aerial recon. Finish the Canadian army's journey through WW2.

name: Brave survivors
description: Break the besiege of various monsters! Upgrade the weapons, choose your favorite skills. Unique combination with skill and role. A 14 minutes roguelike experience, shoot with fantastic and exciting experience!! Believe yourself and beat the boss!

name: Loot, Luck & Levels
description: Luck, Loot & Levels is a roguelike co-op multiplayer dungeon crawler with randomly generated dungeons and MOBA inspired design. Descend into the Dungeon of Depth to uncover valuables lost to the land, hone your delver's skills, and empower yourself with magical ancient artifacts!

name: Gamma 19
description: Gamma 19 is an action RPG with beat 'em up battle mechanics. Punch and shoot your way through robots, worms, and creatures from another dimension in this strange new world!

name: D.E.V Bloodline
description: D.E.V Bloodline is a Indie Horrorgame You find you self in your Residental Area with nothing but Darkness, can you arrive from the shadows or do you fall victim to them ?!

name: Fell from another world
description: Fell from another world is a visual novel with RPG elements, team recruitement, minigames and exploration. Travel from earth to this strange new world along with Eurys and reveal the secrets behind the head of the kingdom.

name: Bob the Goose
description: Bob the Goose is an old school FPS with roguelike elements. It's about a goose searching for his human friend who was kidnaped by lame Old People.

name: Mission Against Terror 2
description: Mission Against Terror 2 offers what none other MMOFPS has to offer and on top of that, its casual! Customize your avatar and battle with it in style. There are hundreds of different costumes to choose from, along with different accessories to enhance your looks. The only limit is your imagination!

name: Sofia the First
description: Let your child help Princess Sofia get to class with this VTech InnoTab Sofia the First game, which includes learning games and creative activities to help him or her learn about colors, shapes, patterns, counting and problem solving.

name: Re-Spawn Tournament
description: Re-Spawn Tournament is a competitive, arena-style multi-player first person shooter game with fast-paced, high energy combat that requires both reflexive skill and tactical thinking.

name: Rock Paper Smash
description: Rock Paper SMASH is a platform fighter where the only attacks are Rock, Paper, and Scissors. Choose from an iconic cast of characters such as Fridge, Car, Fox, and more!

name: S4Game
description: S4Game aims to provide health professionals with an innovative approach to acquire soft skills to foster their professional development. Their main learning objective is the acquisition of soft skills required during work in an operating room, such as communication or teamwork.

name: Saber Ship
description: Travel through the spatio-temporal tunnel with your ship. Destroy aerialships to gain enough energy to meet any possible challenges ahead.

name: Samurai of Hyuga Book 5: Side Stories 11-20
description: A collection of the second ten short stories in the world of Hyuga, featuring your favorite characters! A total of over 63,000 words!

name: Shocked
description: Control electricity in this inFAMOUS-inspired game!

name: Sins From Magdala
description: Enjoy this puzzle game in first person, escape room style, in which you will have to discover 7 enigmas that are hidden behind the "controversial" biblical figure of Mary Magdalene.

name: Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down to Size Supreme
description: Hop and bop your way to victory against a wild parade of killer blocks in this endless runner!

name: Sky Captain's Return
description: Inspired by the classics "Future Cop L.A.P.D" and "Herzog Zwei" in Sky Captain's Return, you play as a strong mecha warrior to conquer the enemy base with your units. Defeat the legendary Sky Captain in single-player mode or compete against your friends or random players.

name: Space
description: Space is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told the story of two lesbians who are absolutely alone on a spaceship. Because of this, they fall in love with each other... The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

name: Spellshaper
description: Fast paced roguelike with a heavy focus on spell crafting, that takes place in a random generated world, where you have to find and kill powerful bosses to defeat the darkness.

name: My Dear Sister
description: My Dear Sister is a first-person story-driven mystery-horror game with puzzles and exploration experience. The game focuses on the secrets of Fellows Family and the story of twin sisters Alice and Astrid.

name: Morris Cave
description: Help Morris find the way out of this cave as quickly as possible. Every level, a new challenge! Defeat the monsters and don't get caught by the traps hidden in the darkness.

name: Party Chaos
description: Fun party game where you can Play minigames with your Friend or against your friends.

name: Order Automatica
description: A turn-based auto battler secret society. Draft your grid of allies, arrange them in synergistic formations, equip items to gain power, and survive against a gauntlet of enemy grids. Perform the rites and ascend with a variety of different team builds to unlock new allies and powerups!

name: Odin's Ring
description: Odin's Ring is a game based on the 9 worlds of Norse mythology. This isometric style will contain a fusion of popular JPRG and MOBA game mechanics.

name: Bartox
description: In this musical adventure game, you'll follow Bart as he realizes his new violin is magical and transports him to a fantasy world, away from his monotonous life. Solve the puzzles and learn about the mysteries within. Oh, and a lush voice is narrating his every move..

name: Bargin to Win
description: BarginToWin is trade bargain simulation game that you buy cheap and sell for profit!

name: Attack of the Trafalas
description: A long time ago in a small island, an organization of evil robots have taken over, with the mission of corrupting and exterminating mankind, until a few decided to resist.

name: Dark Atlas: Infernum
description: If Hell is a state of the soul, this story is the descent to the inner abyss. Atlas Negro: Infernum is a disturbing first-person story , where the end of the world is combined with psychological terror in a survival horror experience with a strong narrative component.

name: A Hero's Quest pt1
description: A Hero's Quest pt 1 Fulfill the role of a Hero and join this cast of misfits in stopping evil and saving the world, but what will happen to them. Will they save the world or will they be stopped?

name: Age of Irata
description: A retro styled sci-fi metroidvania without the technical limitations. Dash, jump, roll, swing, and shoot your way back through 5 planets in this open styled exploration adventure in all of its pixel art glory!

name: Age of Dynasty
description: Age of Dynasty is an open-world survival game that spans from the end of the Stone Age to the future

name: The Kraken Wakes
description: Featuring ground-breaking interactive voice technology. Speak to the characters and receive responses in real-time to change the story, as you experience an alien attack on the oceans of Planet Earth. The exclusive interactive adaptation of John Wyndham's epic scifi/horror novel, The Kraken Wakes.

name: The Last Premiere
description: The Last Premiere is a 3D action adventure, in which you use your sword, hammer, wing capes and wits to solve the mysterious deaths of a troupe of actors in the 1930s.

name: The Pit
description: A flashy, fast paced, third person action roguelike filled with exciting characters, biblically accurate enemies, fully procedural environments and build customization to fit your play-style and become an unstoppable god.

name: Wayward Shadows
description: Wayward Shadows is a rogue-lite monster hunting RPG with turn-based battles. Travel the United States of the 1980s and solve mysterious murders to earn experience, gather equipment, and level up. Build your custom team of hunters and find the best strategy to defeat evil and save the world.

name: Utter Inverse
description: Something wicked enters our Dynast's high demesne. UTTER INVERSE - an RPG about the meeting of two points. Salt on your tongue : as the night sky crackles : the SWORD hums in your hands.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: QR National GE C44aci
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including these versions by Queensland Rail National (QRN). This pack features the 5000 and 6000 class QRN locos.

description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including these versions by Queensland Rail National (QRN). This pack features the 5000 and 6000 class QRN locos.

description: A sci-fi action-adventure platformer. Travel the Inu System and talk to a colorful cast of NPCs across various worlds. Explore maze-like levels by running, double jumping, and dashing. Fight off various robotic enemies using special melee attacks, and eventually take down the boss of each dungeon.

name: Zombies TD
description: A tower defense game mixed with a little luck. A horde of angry zombies is approaching, bombs have been placed but they will only explode in ten minutes, until then you need to defend the objective with what you have and what you have.

name: Zoo Chess
description: Game based on chess where each piece on the board has its unique ability. You can play against the A.I or with your friends online

name: EmagineWorld
description: In this game, you can freely switch the size of the voxel, and the player's perspective can also be converted synchronously. Pyramid voxels allow you to build buildings with angled angles. By slicing voxels into smaller sized voxels, you can create rich details for buildings.

name: Eat Bananas

description:
Kilubu is a quiet village ...
Until a day of curious events happens: Renée can no longer sing, Tom becomes clumsy on the job, Emir is turning red ...
All the villagers are rushing to Sacha, the sorcerer! With his famous magic potions, he will stir up solutions to all of their bizarre problems!
Using the Magic Book of Spells and some clever investigating, players work with Sacha to make the right potions for people who need your help!

name: Bubble Pop Letters & Shapes
description: Learn letters, numbers, colors, and shapes while having fun popping bubbles. Touch the bubble to pop. Learn uppercase and lowercase letters; numbers up to 15; the shapes including triangle square, diamond, rectangle, and oval; and the colors including red, green, blue, yellow, pink, purple, orange, brown, and black.

name: Crazy Wheel Rider HD
description: Go for a ride with Crazy Wheel Rider HD and be the fastest squirrel on earth.

name: Giana Sisters
description: The legend is back, better and bigger than ever before. To use the potential of current devices we improved the graphics and controls. Today the game captivates through its full HD graphic and a new userfriendly menustructure.

name: Litguy Adventure
description: Litguy Adventure is 2D Parkour Platformer Game Our young character realizes his new powers and Start on an adventure, A challenging adventure awaits him in the "Lit" Universe! Help him in this adventure!

name: Noah's Ark Animal Adventures
description:
When Noah hears a great flood is coming, he quickly builds an ark and gathers two of every animal on earth.
Hop on board the ark with Noah and the animals for a fun learning adventure!

name: The Incredibles: Mission Incredible

name: Bratz Fashion Pixiez: The Secret Necklace
description: In the educational game, you will be transformed into a Bratz girl. There are several games to choose from. You can earn style points to get get new outfits and change your hairstyle. The game also includes tips on social and beauty topics ad well as information about travel fashion and astrology. Then there is a quiz section, a studio where you can design Bartz fashion and a music studio. The game teaches children vocabulary, spelling, design, fashion, logic and music.

name: Sanatorium: A Mental Asylum Simulator
description: Set in a fictionalized version of the 1920s where the lines between modern psychiatric treatment and pseudoscience are still muddy at best. Sanatorium is a 2D card-based workplace adventure where the player has to test, diagnose and treat patients. At its core, Sanatorium is a comment on the turbulent history of the practices and pseudoscience used to stigmatize mental illnesses.

name: Black Diamond
description: Black Diamond is a built in game in TempleOS.

name: Gravity Bandits
description: Find your way through a haunted castle, by manipulating gravity.

name: Keeper
description: A simple but challenging goalkeeping game for the playdate. How many saves can you make before you concede?

name: A Pointless Adventure
description: A Throw back to classic Atari adventure games, but with a completely ridiculous story.

name: Break Thru the Wall
description: It is a simple puzzle. It can be solved by aligning colors with panel slides. With your idea and thinking, Break thru the Wall.

name: Hero Wheels
description: Drive at high speeds and take out the Boss! Dodge Enemies and bombs Take on new worlds Unlock different characters

name: Knight's Castle
description: Medieval Minigames for Toddlers and Kids!

name: TerraGenesis: Landfall
description: From the makers of TerraGenesis comes TerraGenesis: Landfall - a free city-building simulator game in which you build and manage cities on planets in our solar system and outer space. Become the mayor of the first extraterrestrial human city and build it up to bring life to another planet. Create life in space and expand your civilization across the galaxy in this city-building simulation. Develop your city with new buildings and level up your new space society, design facilities, manage resources and keep your galactic residents happy and healthy.

name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story
description: This is the first installment of a six episode saga, and featuring around one hour of gameplay with features for replay-ability.

name: Dexter Stardust
description: Space! Dexter Stardust barely escaped when the Vreesians, inhabitants of the menacing Planet X, sent a fleet of robots to destroy all life on Earth. Now, twenty years later, a mechanical man from the 10th planet seeks to communicate with Dexter a very important message - he is the key to saving both humans and Vreesians! Play the taco-loving Dexter Stardust as he, and his good friend Aurora, go on the greatest adventure of their lives and discover the mystery of the Robot from the Planet X!

name: BackYard Hoops
description: Basketball just as you remember it as a kid. Older brother slamming the ball into your face not included.

name: Soul Unleashed
description:
Soul Unleashed is an Adventure RPG made just for those adults who may have forgotten what an adventure feels like.
It is a brand-new app inspired by the good-old days of gaming. Paying homage to the PC games of the 80's, it seeks to bring out the sort of board game feel you would find in tabletop RPGs and trading card games!

name: Cookie Gluttons TD
description:
The Cookie Gluttons lived joyfully and in harmony until all the cookies disappeared from CookieLand… Now, the starving Cookie Gluttons have discovered that there is another planet in the galaxy that has plenty of cookies… Planet Earth! They’ve invaded us and they are now inside your home!! And they are coming for your cookies!!!
To repel them you’ll count with eight types of towers, each one with several upgrades. It won’t be easy, they are many and diverse, and each different species has different skills… If they overflown you, you can still use lots of power ups to strengthen your defenses!
A game with cute 3D characters and scenarios that you will love.
A fun and adictive strategy and defense game!
You are the last hope to keep our cookies here, in the Earth, the planet counts with you!

name: Arcade Paradise: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Climber: Fun Adventure
description: Fantasy Climber - is a classic platformer with modern design, honed game mechanics and retro aestetics. Each peak prepares new surprises and increases the difficulty of climbing!

name: Public Restroom Simulator 2022
description: Public Restroom Simulator 2022 is a first-person-shooter that truly captures the feel of what it feels like to use a public restroom in the current year. You can either play one-on-one matches or just try to survive as long as possible in the single player mode. Either way it is gonna get messy.

name: 1387: MMO Strategy
description: 1387 is a text based free-to-play MMO strategy game that is inspired by 2010's social media games. Manage your resources, train your army and found alliances or attack to other players.

name: Bounce your Bullets!
description: Your bullets get stronger and stronger after they bounce enough times. Bounce your Bullets! is a casual top down shooter where you survive for as long as possible against growing waves of enemies.

name: Christmas Shooter
description: it's a 2d game focused on Christmas where it's snowing and you have to shoot candy at people, the game should be fun and have nice music. Your end is a goal where you have to get all the way to the end and you have two endings which are secret and normal

name: Don't Fraud My Heart!
description: Don't Fraud my Heart is a visual novel made entirely in Microsoft Powerpoint. It is a romantic, financially literate adventure that brings you into the exciting world of tax auditing.

name: Ultra Moto VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Prestige Tree
description: Prestige Tree is an incremental idle game made for browsers by Jacorb, and features multiple layers of progression that compile upon each other in a tree format.

name: Hello Kitty: Hello Kitty's Surprise
description: Hello Kitty is throwing a surprise party for her twin sister, Mimmy, and her friends are eager to help out.

name: Al Andalus 711
description: Al Andalus 711 is a first-person graphic adventure game set in a historical version of medieval Spain from the 8th century. The player takes on the role of a young fisherman who will travel to a series of locations to carry out different missions.

name: Puzzle Champions
description:
Solve the puzzles to obtain treasure and even save the princess from Goblins!

If you are trying to locate the actual game where you solve puzzles with lava, water, dangerous enemies, etc. then look no further! That is EXACTLY the gameplay you get with this game - nothing more; nothing less. Puzzle Champions puts you in control of helping our young hero work their way through various puzzle challenges in order to obtain treasures and save his love from certain death!

name: Long Live the King!
description: Long Live the King is a story-driven RPG, where the player's choices will impact the story in major ways. Players must make decisions, pay close attention to character dialogue and actions, and decide who they can trust. Will you stand with your countrymen or your kin? The decision is yours.

name: Wreckreation
description: Wreckreation hands you the keys to your very own driving and building open world called MixWorld! Explore 400 square kilometers of pure sandbox joy as you create, race and wreck alone or together with your friends.

name: Sonic Epoch Advance
description:
Sonic Epoch features SatAM Sonic in a time travel adventure as he is blasted 10 years into the future; a dark future where Dr. Robotnik has essentially won, and the very few remaining Knothole Freedom Fighters are barely clinging to life. Sonic arrives to reinvigorate the world and perhaps still be able to fight back the evil Doctor and hopefully somehow get back to his own time.

The GBA version was a revival of the cancelled PC version. While the GBA version is "finished", it was a rush job, more for the sake of filling the gap of the previous version's incomplete status, and did not completely honor all aspects of the original story.

name: The Accursed Crown
description: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King is an old school role-playing game, single player, party based.

name: Warlock's Tower
description: Warlock's Tower is a retro puzzler with elegantly designed levels around one simple rule - one move equals one life lost. Watch your step!

name: Braveheart
description: Braveheart is a dynamic action / role-playing game with a unique combat system. King has sent you, the brave knight Richard, in search of the Holy Grail - an ancient chalice that has been protected for centuries by the most powerful creature on Earth, the Great Dragon! The king has promised the person who finds it not only half of the kingdom, but also his beautiful daughter’s hand in marriage. But uncovering this treasure will not be easy. You must use various tactics to fight the dangerous enemies and overcome the treacherous obstacles that stand in your way. Can you conquer the dark forces against you to find the Grail and claim your prize?

name: Silent Abyss: Fate of Heroes
description: The heroes who have fallen in rumors, now appear in this silent and terrible hell, greet their last fate! This is a dual-role Rogue-like game. Choose two heroes, use their unique cards and abilities to kill a bloody path in hell and completely eliminate the culprit!

name: The Little Plane That Could
description:
Board your biplane for some chivalrous dogfights in the sky.
Take part in aerial battles with up to 60 planes and show them how is ace!
May the best pilot win. And in case you are not the best pilot: don't despair, we have flight school lined up for you as well!
This super smooth biplane simulator comes to you from the author of the hit game 'The Little Crane That Could.'
`The Little Plane That Could' comes with eight challenging missions and supports Game Center for keeping track of your performance and achievements.

name: Fashion Girls
description: Fashion Girls & Super Puzzler in one game! Calling all fashionistas! Classic Arcade Puzzle Game comes back as a mix between Fashion & Puzzle! In Fashion Girls you will become a fashionista trying to obtain new costumes and try to become the best photogra…

V.Smile V-Motion uses a wireless, motion-sensitive controller to help teach shapes, colors, matching, problem solving, logic, letters, numbers, puzzles and recycling. Featuring characters from Disney and Pixar's WALL-E movie, kids will have a blast getting into the action.

name: Minnie Mouse Bow-tique: Super Surprise Party!

name: CosmoOdyssey: Trip to Mars
description: CosmoOdyssey: Trip to Mars is a first-person spaceship adventure with a special Ukrainian flavor.

name: Cueist 2
description: Cueist 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the the original hit pool and snooker game for iOS. Play against a friend or challenge one of the CPU controlled players of increasing skill. Customizable tables, 8 selectable physics models (some serious, some not so much) and a wealth of opponents make this the perfect way to have a relaxing game of pool on your mobile device.

Gaining starry energy, the interstellar train will take you to explore the unknown universe, weave new stories with animal friends. Reopen galaxy routes and reflourish the desolate universe.

name: Shadow Force
description: Shadow Force is an action role-playing game with rogue-lite elements in dark universe. Become a vigilante monster hunter who hunts and slay ancient and terrifying creatures.

name: Mirror Beauty

A misguided monster invasion becomes a raucous road trip through life on earth. Choose from a menagerie of mischievous monsters and a ton of terrible trucks, and come along on this contemptible cruise through the countryside!
Monsters 'N Trucks is the most skate-tastic side-scrolling driving game you've ever seen! You'll race through challenges and scenarios, doing radical stunts and gonzo tricks along the way. Complete the story to unlock new levels, or go for a high score to unlock new characters and vehicles!

name: The Pig Quiz

description: The Chronicles of Nathan - The Maze Hunter is an episodic action-adventure puzzle game with a Tomb Raider / Indiana Jones style of gameplay. The game has two game modes the story and expedition.

It has a fresh and beautiful game world, a new synthesis and development gameplay, and adds unique game features. Brings you the best leisure time, a variety of unique elf varieties, waiting for you to unlock .

name: Railroad Corporation: Niagara River
description: You are offered a unique opportunity that will cement your place as the market leader in your field: Connecting the United States to Canada... The caveat? You must build over the mighty Niagara River.

name: Chicken Rescue
description:
The ultimate cute, family friendly tilt-based arcade game. Help Mama Chicken find her lost chicks! They're missing and it's up to you to bring them back to the coop.
Guide Mama Chicken through more than 40 exciting and colorful levels using your choice of gyroscope, accelerometer or virtual joystick. Avoid trees and barrels, hungry pigs, and treacherous ledges. Earn coins and stars for completing levels, then use your coins to unlock in-game boosts and fun skins such as Ninja Chicken, Robot Chicken, and Chicken Zombie!
Supports saving to iCloud so you can save your game on one iOS device and pick it back up on another.

name: Mission Mars Mobile
description:
Mission Mars is an offline action 3D FPS inspired by the shooters of the 1990s.
The game features an intense single player experience set on Mars in the 22nd century.
You are part of a crew on a mission to Mars. The plan is to land on Mars for exploration and colonization. The flight and landing were successful. During construction of a base something went wrong. There was an explosion, the base is destroyed. You are the only one who survived. A spacecraft used in the mission is undamaged. The goal is to get to the spacecraft and return to Earth. The path to the spacecraft leads through three maps situated on the Mars surface and underground.

name: Super Weapon Master
description: You need to defeat them to collect gold coins to strengthen yourself! There will be more than 20 unique weapons, more than 30 powerful relics, and more than 80 upgrade options in the game. It is guaranteed that each game has a completely different gaming experience.

name: Der Blaue Diamant: Additional mission
description: In this additional mission, you're able to do a very little mission in which you have to find a boy's Smartphone and bring it back to him.

name: Command: Modern Operations - Showcase Queen Elizabeth
description: Command Showcase is a series of scenarios that will put you in command of the most significant weapons sensors and units in the modern era with new and hypothetical theaters of war.

name: Classy Train
description: Classy Train is a classic style 2D platformer, where the goal is to get from one station to the other, while avoiding runaway trains and other obstacles. Music has been composed and performed by myself on piano in a jazzy style to create a fun, relaxing atmosphere. Pixel art was also custom created.

name: Duterra
description: An isometric action RPG set in a medieval world of corporation-like guilds, you'll embark on a journey to pull your family out of debt, choosing to assist or betray the very guilds that hold power over you. At your disposal is an arsenal of melee and ranged weapons to fight opposing factions.

name: Esoteric Ebb
description: ESOTERIC EBB is a single-player CRPG inspired by the freedom of tabletop adventures. Unravel a political conspiracy with your goblin sidekick. Roll dice in tense encounters. Become a cleric of legends or completely ruin the campaign.

name: Fatal Blade
description: Fatal Blade is an action RPG that provides the best combat experience in a fantasy world.

name: Flag Defense
description: Participate in an action loaded platformer-realtime-strategy-game. Build yourself a superior base and be prescient about the enemy's next move.

name: Floor44
description: Floor44 is a survivor horror game with randomly generated maps, the goal is to survive. Unlock more abilities in order to make it to the final room on 44th floor.

name: Fragment Hunters
description: Crystal Souls: Fragment Hunters is a top down indie space game where you shoot enemy ships, gather crystals, and upgrade your own ship.

name: Furry Superstar
description: Once a famous model, now a depressed middle-aged woman - there is no chance she's gonna get back to the top... Unless a young model agent-boy helps her to feel loved again!

name: Goblins Factory
description: Solve the mystery of the Goblin Factory anomalies by traveling through wormholes and black holes in a Distant Galaxy. THE GAME HAS: -Crafting system - Stealth Mode - Robot Control - Riddles - Jetpack flight mode - Underwater adventures - Racing on icy planets - Cool stylized 2D graphics

name: Grim Survivor
description: Grim Survivor is a top-down roguelike 2D dark casual game where you try to survive waves of enemies and power-up your hero to try to climb a leaderboard! Choices are important and the hordes of enemies get bigger over time.

name: Guilds n Glory
description: Command an army of assassins, archers, barbarians, knights, priests, or wizards and dominate your opposing guilds in this action battle game. Use power-ups and special attacks to turn the tide of battles.

name: Haunted Girls
description: This gal game combines both horror and romance for an experience overflowing with thrills. What will be your fate? A sweet, happy ending or a truly unspeakable one?

name: HoleShot Drag Racing
description: HoleShot Drag Racing is a semi realistic drag racing game set in the late 1960s. Build your Car and race it in the glory years of Drag Racing

name: Hotel Simulator
description: In Hotel Simulator, you become the new owner of an old and neglected hotel. Bring back its splendor by cleaning, renovation, and interior design. Hire the crew, manage your business, and make it known as the fanciest hotel in the city!

name: House of Moiré
description: An audio-visual artwork. Enter a void-like shapeshifting realm and visit a succession of rooms dressed in optical patterns, responsive audio programming, and minimalist spatial design. Adapted from a live show by Chloe Alexandra Thompson & Matthew Edwards.

name: Isostasy
description: A 2D side-scrolling Metroidvania platformer with 8-bit NES-style graphics and sound. Find weapon upgrades and other power-ups that allow you to explore an open world.

name: Kakudo
description: Kakudo is a maze exploration and adventure game. As a small humanoid named Tamashi, you will escape labyrinths while collecting as many coins as possible and beating your personal high scores. Complete all 50 puzzles to discover Kakudo's enigmatic story !

name: Magus Pocus
description: A 2D platform action adventure game. With medieval fantasy setting. Composed of 9 phases divided into 2 stages and at the end of each stage a boss. With simple and fun movement where you defeat your enemies by jumping on them or using your magic sword. The game will provide you with hours of fun.

name: Lord of the Imps
description: Lord Of The Imps is a survival strategy game. Build, gather resources, expand, defeat your enemies and Regain your position as the ruler of hell.

name: Little Legion
description: Little Legion is a fast-paced top-down shooter in space where you command an ever-expanding fleet of drones to battle through waves and defeat powerful bosses, with upgrades and level-ups along the way to help you conquer stronger and stronger challenges.

name: Krimzon hoard
description: Experience a frenetically paced wave based hoard game, Play the one room challenge mode to learn the gun skills and surviving to high rounds and then Explore and find your way through the multiple levels of the campaign.

name: Kube
description: Kube is a 2D platformer where you'll have to think in 3D. Your perspective will change, but remember: gravity always pushes downward! Run, jump, and swim around a multitude of cubes. Meet creatures, avoid traps and solve puzzles in this game where each world you visit introduces fresh new mechanics.

name: Nightmares of the death
description: Nightmares of the death it's a psychological horror game in which you will be exploring an unknown place as client 101 while learning the truth of why you are in this place collecting the memories of who you used to be.

name: Nonogram: Kawaii Cuties
description: This game, called "Nonogram", is a logic puzzle that correctly fills the squares from the given hints. Solve the puzzles and complete the "cute" picture!

name: Oblige of Chaos
description: 2D art and 3D action. Elemental Reactions. Not too big Open World. Battle , Puzzle and Explore. Life has no save point.

name: Outer Darkness
description: Lay waste to hordes of evil in the Outer Darkness. Learn and augment spells and upgrade your character's abilities. Unlock and harness 8 different elements with unique gameplay to escape the forsaken dominion.

name: Over the Speed Limit
description: Test your racing skills with this challenging racing game . Customise your car , make it look better and faster and test it to a drag race . Be the first to cross the finish line in different racing classes .

name: Pimp My Cruise
description: So you wanna be a businessman? Get fast money in an easy way? For some crazy reason you want it to be related to the sea? You've come to the right place! You only need to... Pimp my Cruise!

name: Reforger
description: Reforger is a unique RTS where you do not control, but instead guide and outfit units in a spin on classic RTS. Fend off hordes of orcs hell-bent on destroying your base, regain control of your time machine to return to your future, and put an end to the conflict once and for all!

name: Sears: The Sky Frontier
description: Sears: The Sky Frontier is a beautiful and epic real-time strategy game that puts you at the head of an army of little stone men against formidable invaders, smartly planning the battle and leading the defense in unique and atmospheric locations.

name: Room 1309
description: Can you escape from Room 1309? Strange ghosts haunt the rooms of the Hotel Orpheus. When you awake in Room 1309 you'll have to solve puzzles and find clues to make it out alive! Room 1309 is Chapter 1 of the Hotel Orpheus series.

name: Rifters
description: Play online with 2 to 4 players as you collect the minions you need to defeat your enemies. Beware of the power your opponents can unleash upon your battlefield.

name: Solas City Heroes
description: Become a hero in this sexy Beat 'em up with RPG elements and erotic content! Set your rules, customize your appearance, pick your talents and specials, and get ready to fight your way through dark alleys, night clubs and secret laboratories in your quest to save Solas City!

name: Slingshot Adventure
description: After making a slingshot Ralph decides to go on a journey between different scenarios to test his skills. Help him to overcome the challenges along his adventure.

name: Tales of Vaalundr
description: Tales of Vaalundr is a side scrolling, action/adventure rpg with a rich story line and fun player class choices!

name: Swords and Sorcery: Sovereign
description: Swords and Sorcery - Sovereign is the sequel to Underworld, a party-based, first person view role-playing game with turn-based combat and a square grid 3D environment. The art was made by a professional comics illustrator.

name: SuuubWaaay
description: Try to survive as long as you can in the SuuubZone, something is always watching you, and you should make sure you're always watching it.

description: This is a city full of crime, the player as a stunning policewoman, criminals arrested and detained in the police station.

name: Station 37
description: Station 37 is a retro style immersive sim where you piece together the mystery of what happened to this once great space station. Solve puzzles, fight aliens and security bots, and explore the world.

name: Star Boy and The Captain of Outer Space
description: Star Boy and the Captain of Outer Space is a On Rails Sci-Fi Space Shooter Adventure from Not Unlike Games! Featuring light Third Person Shooter element, Multiple Playable Characters, and a Dynamic Story!

name: Spellstruck
description: Face off in the ultimate showdown of elemental magic in Spellstruck. A game of tactical and reactive, arena style combat on randomised maps. Curve spells through the air, deflect attacks and combine an ever-growing list of unique abilities to defeat your rivals.

name: Talking Dogs
description: you play as Phil The Husky in this dog adventure game set in a peaceful place called Dreams Island, you will explore and try to find your best friend Glen who went missing from his hometown of dog-town

name: The Coroner Saga: Episode 5 - Life Paths
description: While the Coroner Institute grapples with various murder investigations, Sara attempts to figure out where her heart lies. Thomas's trip abroad provides the young doctor something else to be concerned about while the institution solves several homicide cases.

name: The Last Trophy
description: A space explorer receives a strange signal from an unknown planet. What is in this place? Help Mell discover the mysteries of this new land in this retro platformer with an arcade feel.

name: The Sun of Broken Euphoria
description: Have you ever heard of the space-time continuum? And have you ever had the luck (or misfortune) to be alone with the laws of time? Two completely ordinary teenagers got into an unequal deadly battle of a mysterious pioneer camp, where every situation is like a shot, and a word is a projectile.

name: WalkBot
description: Play through this short story of WalkBot. Solve puzzles using the unique body-switching mechanic to progress and see the story unfold.

name: Valete vos viatores
description: The ancient Romans erected their tombs and mausoleums along the roads so that travelers could read the inscriptions on their tombstones. The player will be able to learn the techniques used for their realization in the person of a scriptor titulorum.

name: Entanglement
description: Can one illustrate the invisible? These artists try. Entanglement is an artwork interpreting an unexplained phenomenon of quantum physics. The viewer contemplates revolving sequences of intricate visuals matched with spatialized audio. Based on a live show by France Jobin & Markus Heckmann.

name: Hunteroids
description: Our cities are being attacked by meteorites & you are the only one able to protect us! However, your weapon can only destroy one type of meteorite... Create bubbles in the sky & transform all meteorites until they have the right shape, colour & rotation before exploding!

name: DinoLife
description:
DinoLife is a Dinosaur farming game with Life-Sim elements.

You are able to create, hatch and look after many Dinosaurs, while making money to expand, buy upgrades or gifts for the residents so you can become friends.

Or you may just want to save and keep personalising your room and house with items you collect while playing.

name: Cache Overload
description: Cache Overload is a fast-paced multi-player FPS taking place in Earth, 2041, as robots. Battle with your friends or other robots on the globe inside various maps and game modes.

name: Arc Intelligence
description: Arc Intelligence is an adventure strategy game for the PC about an artificial intelligence that tries to take over the world. What would you do if your mind was inside a computer? Do you have what it takes to become the arch intelligence in this arced adventure?

name: Burn the Witch
description: THEY TOLD ME TO MAKE THE BURN THE WITCH. ROGUELIKE IN THE DARK FANTASY SETTING. I'M NOT AGAINST IT

name: Warp Lab
description: Experience seamless portal gameplay mechanics in VR. Warp Lab allows you to take full advantage of immersive player-controlled portals across a diverse array of puzzle, combat, and sandbox levels.

name: Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist
description: Introducing the first ever simulation game where you can manage game animals on your properties, and boost their genetics by buying better quality animals to breed with your herd. Try to maintain a decent population while protecting them from natural predators.

name: The Apocryphal Gensoukyou
description: Sin descripción

name: Meikyuu Machi no Grace
description: Grace, a powerful swordsman with huge debts, joined the labyrinth exploration in order to solve the problem of money, and unavoidably helped men with sex-related services. A degenerate roguelike game where men get married and have children!

name: Mine Boss Simulator
description: "Mine Boss Simulator", as the name suggests, is a game that simulates a mine boss. It is also the sequel to "Lick Dog Simulator".

name: The Descent
description: A fantasy rogue-like shooter game set below the crust of the Earth.

name: Faithful Backrooms
description: The mod that extends the regular Minecraft experience, adding in over 20 Backrooms levels to the game, coupled with progression, advancements, and lots of entities and terrifying environments to discover.

name: 80 Days & Overboard!
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Diary
description: Sin descripción

name: Hugungui Beopchik
description: Sin descripción

name: Poseidon Kiugi: Bangchihyeong Aeksyeon RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Those Left Behind
description: A 3rd person action-horror zombie game with elements of survival, time management and base management.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus
description:
A unity-standalone 2-10 player remake of the Mario vs. Luigi gamemode from the New Super Mario Bros DS download game.

Includes the 5 default levels (Grassland, Bricks, Castle, Pipes, and Ice), along with a handful of custom levels to battle on! All power-ups are included and remain faithful to their original counterparts, along with the new addition of the Propeller Suit & Ice Flower!

name: Paramount Hero
description: Inspired by multiplayer classics, Paramount Hero is a third-person skill-progression MMO with a fantasy world setting. Kill mobs, collect loot, hone your skills, complete quests, and cooperate with (or kill!) other players to become a legendary hero.

name: Noa's Project
description: NOA’s PROJECT is a voxel rogue-lite stylish action game. Secret agent NOA fights against various types of enemies using katana and submachine gun. NOA challenges random generated dungeons to complete her secret missions.

name: HexTD
description: HexTD is a tower defense game where players can choose from 3 classes to defend their base. Deploy your machines, soldiers or elementals to create the enemies path and guard against powerful bosses, playing solo or with a friend to create a new experience in tower defense genre.

name: Easy Simple Game
description: Meet the Unsuspicious dude, take a job from him and walk through deadly spikes, slimes and spinning blades. Sounds pretty simple, isn't it?
